name: INTaskResolutionResult
desc: A resolution result for a single task within a task list.

items.name: class func success(with: INTask) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.

items.name: class func confirmationRequired(with: INTask?) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires confirmation from the user before proceeding.

items.name: class func disambiguation(with: [INTask]) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.
